name: bistrot
description: A CLI client and also an API library for RumSystem.net.

scripts.gitsync: ( git commit -am "Released @ `date`" || true ) && git pull && git push
scripts.readme:
cat template.md > README.md && echo '
```markdown' >> README.md && ./bin/bistrot.mjs --json >> README.md && echo '```' >> README.md
scripts.build: npm run updep && ( git commit -am 'update dependencies' || true ) && node build.mjs && npm run readme
scripts.pub: npm run build && npm run gitsync
scripts.docker-publish: npm run docker-build && npm run docker-push

author: Leask Wong <i@leaskh.com>
